txt.en:
[placeholder],

I have been informed of news that needs attention. With it comes a lesson, and I can think of no better charge for you to undertake. Bring the letter to me in Bree, and I will see that you are set to the task.

Dawn Appledore
'It is good to see you. I am pleased that you responded so quickly to my summons. Now to the task.'
You received a letter from your trainer in Bree-town asking for you to return to her. Apparently, there is something that she wishes to teach you.
Bring the letter to Dawn Appledore in Bree
Dawn Appledore sent you a letter requesting that you visit her in the Bree Jail.\n\nDeliver the letter to Dawn Appledore. She can be found in the Bree Jail.
